00006 package ScheatorDb;
00007 import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
00008 import java.sql.*;
00009 
00014 public class Series extends DbObject {
00015 
00017     private static final String[] TABLE_NAME = {"Series"};
00019     private static final String ID_FIELD = "ID";
00021     private static final String[] FIELDS = {"ID", "Name"};
00022 
00031     public Series() {
00032         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00033         db = new MySqlDb();
00034         fetch(0);
00035     }
00036 
00040     public final void fetch(int key) {
00041         this.currentId = key;
00042         list.clear();
00043         String[] idFields = null;
00044         String[] ids = null;
00045         if (key != 0) {
00046             idFields[0] = "season";
00047             ids[0] = String.valueOf(currentId);
00048         }
00049         
00050         try {
00051             Statement st = db.con.createStatement();
00052             ResultSet rs = st.executeQuery(db.qe.getItems(TABLE_NAME, null, idFields , ids, null));
00053             while (rs.next()) {
00054                 String id = rs.getString(FIELDS[0]);
00055                 String name = rs.getString(FIELDS[1]);
00056                 Data series = new Data(Integer.parseInt(id.trim()), name);
00057                 list.put(id, series);
00058             }
00059         } catch (Exception e) {
00060             System.err.println("Failed to read series data: " + e.toString());
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00067     public class Data extends DbObject.Data {
00068 
00073         Data(String name) {
00074             this.field_id = 0;
00075             this.field_name = name;
00076         }
00077 
00083         Data(int id, String name) {
00084             this.field_id = id;
00085             this.field_name = name;
00086         }
00087     }
00088 }
